rooms.name: Main Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with a reception area that embodies Art Deco aesthetics. Features geometric patterns and elegant fixtures.

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: Open space for socializing with a partitioned dining section. Designed with bold lines and rich materials as per Art Deco style.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Quiet retreat featuring built-in bookcases and ambient lighting, integrating Vastu principles for knowledge flow.

rooms.name: Servant Quarters
rooms.description: Functional living space for household staff, ensuring privacy and comfort with practical design.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern guest bathroom adjoining servant quarters. Incorporates subtle Art Deco motifs.
